text:
:books: I just started reading Content Inc. by Joe Pulizzi. Have you read it? What resonated with you the most?

Admittedly, I don't finish a lot of books. Either I'm not in the mood for that topic anymore or I lose interest in the writing/content. This one however, I can't seem to put this one down. This may very well be one of the few books I actually finish! :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye:
